com.stripe.android.view.i18n

Class TranslatorManager

  • com.stripe.android.view.i18n.TranslatorManager

  • public class TranslatorManager

    A class that provides a interface ErrorMessageTranslator for translating server-provided error messages, as defined in Stripe API Errors Reference.

    See class PaymentMethodsActivity for example usage.

    To use a custom interface ErrorMessageTranslator in your app, override Application.onCreate in your app's Application subclass and call setErrorMessageTranslator.

    See Also:
    interface ErrorMessageTranslator, Stripe API Errors Reference, class PaymentMethodsActivity, interface ErrorMessageTranslator, Application.onCreate, setErrorMessageTranslator

        A class that provides a interface ErrorMessageTranslator for translating server-provided error messages, as defined in Stripe API Errors Reference.
